Effect: Your next rolled attack is guaranteed Easy and ignores your skill reductions.
Roll the next attack three times and take the best outcome.
Find a target with extrasensory means (e.g. thermal imaging, echolocation).
Roll once to attack a Near target. Damages everything Close to the target.
Find and identify hidden trails and footprints.
Switch out unused chips in your Folder for ones in your pack.
Pick a used BattleChip in your Folder. It is now usable again - once per chip.
Learn 1 per hit: the target’s stats+skills, Folder, Powers, NCPs, and element.
You can dodge an attack with Info if you’ve seen this enemy use it before.
Scan a Close Virus/object to reveal the target’s recent memories/interactions.
Change your NaviCust setup without jacking out.
Generate a Near simple structure that is either hard, large, or hidden.
Pick a Near target; disables their last used power/NCP until they roll 3 times.
Put a temporary door on a Near entrance that blocks known enemies.
Pass through a thin structure (walls, floors, pipes, etc).
Your next attack roll ignores Guards and upshifts the target’s next 4 Body rolls.
Your next melee or Strength roll hits any number of targets in range.
Launch a Close target one range band in any direction.
Destroy a Close structure or piece of terrain.
Make a ranged attack on a grounded Near target.
Roll your next 3 defense rolls twice, using the better result.
Instantly move up to one range band.
Reshape your body to fit in tight or oddly-shaped spaces. (Not a disguise.)
Launch a range band in any direction off of a surface.
Slip past an inanimate threat (e.g. traps, sensors).
Cure all negative secondary effects from outside sources. Usable on Close allies.
The next 5 times you roll or use a BattleChip, heal 1 HP. (Damage comes first.)
Your body is briefly (pick 1) superhot; icy; superheavy; camouflaged; or luminous.
Move along or stick to any Close surface, or stick any Close object to you.
Parry a ranged attack, rolling Stamina. Reflects secondary effects.
Look like a Virus or Navi you’ve met (appearance only).
Trick a hostile Virus into helping you. The bigger the ask, the shorter it lasts.
Avert hostile attention from yourself.
Gradually lull a Close target to sleep.
Imitate someone else’s voice.
The next time an ally of your choice is attacked, you are attacked instead.
Add two dice to someone else’s Soul roll (before they roll).
A Close target cannot move range bands until line of sight breaks.
Convince one or more Near targets to focus their hostile attention on you.
Use Bravery to attack a Close target that recently attacked an ally.
Your next rolled attack covers the target with your element.
If your element is present, heal someone for 3 HP.
Consume all of your element to create a minion with one purpose.
Make a ranged attack with your element if it is present.
Swap places with an abundance of your element in line of sight.
Increase your Folder size by 2 until rest.
Instantly trade BattleChips with a Near ally.
Increase your Mind by 1.
Increase your Body by 1.
Increase your Soul by 1.
Increase your Sense by 1.
Increase your Info by 1.
Increase your Coding by 1.
Increase your Strength by 1.
Increase your Speed by 1.
Increase your Stamina by 1.
Increase your Charm by 1.
Increase your Bravery by 1.
Increase your Affinity by 1.

If your element is present, heal someone for 3 HP.
Consume all of your element to create a minion with one purpose.
Make a ranged attack with your element if it is present.
Swap places with an abundance of your element in line of sight.
Increase your Folder size by 2 until rest.
Instantly trade BattleChips with a Near ally.
You can turn Guard chips into your element after slot-in.
You can mark anything with your symbol. This mark acts like a hand-sized sticker.
When you meet someone new, you can find their latest public social media post.
Your head becomes detachable, retaining all your senses.
You give off a sinister aura; criminals like you more, and others will like you less.
You can be traced by your unique Navi ID. (Free to buy, 1500z to remove.)
When you roll 3+ hits to make your element, a bonded ally can roll to make theirs.
When using a Hazard chip, you can make it appear on a delay. Max 10 minutes.
You can roll NetOp Coding instead of Navi Coding to download Virus data.
On a critical Body roll, downshift your 1st Charm roll on anyone who saw it.
Your voice projects; you can be clearly understood at Far range.
You record everything you see and hear. It’s visually obvious when recording.
You can appear like a Mr. Prog! (Hat of your choice optional.)
Beeps depending on proximity to nearest Mr. Prog.
You can leave a sign, similar to a BBS post, anywhere online.
On jack-in, your presence has loud, colorful fanfare, drawing all attention to you.
If a failed roll has three or more 1’s, count it as two hits instead.
On sending Virus data to a Blank BattleChip, get a bonus 300z. (Does not stack.)
To download Virus data, you can erase a chip in your Folder for a full success.
Shot BattleChips and Sense ranged attacks have no penalty at Far range.
You can move a range band without rolling when attacking with a Blade chip.
Spend 600z to add one die to a roll. (Use before rolling.)
When you download Virus data onto a Blank BattleChip, roll at least 4 dice.
Can turn Thrown chips into mines! They target whoever touches or attacks them.
When something reduces one of your skills by 1, your element appears Close to you.
3 times per jack-in, you can spring a range band in any direction. Can still act in midair.
If you have a few uninterrupted minutes, you can roll 4 dice to make your element.
When you use Rush chips, you can take a Close target with you.
A Mettaur-like pet! It can’t attack, obeys basic orders, and disappears for a bit if hit.
You can use Impact chips at Near. Makes chips Dangerous. Cannot parry at range.
Pick a descriptor - NPCs will associate you with that word unless they know better.
On jack-in, your element appears around you; if you use it immediately, downshift.
If in the middle of an attack, ignore stun/interrupting effects until your attack ends.
When you move range bands with a chip or roll, your element trails behind you.
You can make your voice come from anywhere in Near range.
When you use a Wave BattleChip at Near range, you can enter Close range of a target.
+3 maximum BattleChips in your Folder.
Fake credentials that shift into whatever you need them to be. [Often Illegal.]
Can use two Shot BattleChips at the same time. Counts as two separate attacks.
Sacrifice an unused chip to instantly spawn a lot of your element Close to you.
When you delete a Virus or Navi, heal 3 HP.
On jack-in, get a 6 HP Guard. It takes dmg for you until it runs out of HP. It can’t heal.
You always float a few inches above the ground.
+4 maximum HP.
After you take damage, downshift your next roll to move a range band.
When a Cost Power boosts your next attack, you can give that effect to an ally instead.
You can shrink to 1/10th normal size. Your attacks are upshifted when shrunk.
You can have two copies of the same chip in your Folder.
When using CrossSoul, you can also use the other Navi’s Navi Powers.
A lethal hit leaves you at 1 HP if you have over 1 HP.
For Cost Powers, you can reduce the stat instead of the skill. Stats can’t go below 1.
When you deal 2+ dmg with a rolled attack, your element covers the target.
If you hold still for ten seconds, you turn invisible until you move.
When you’re at or below 2 HP, add four dice to all rolled attacks.
Before you roll, can spend up to 3 HP to add that many dice to it.
On Near Virus deletion, get its passives until jack-out or next trigger. Can toss all passives.
When using a Support BattleChip, you can transfer the benefits to a Near ally instead.
+1 maximum MegaChips in your Folder.
All Bond Powers except Overload cost one less Bond Point to activate.
Work with the GM to design a NaviChip based off of you. Only you can use it.
Can speak in code to anyone who has this NCP. Sounds like animal noises otherwise.
Your PET contains a cozy home base. You can make a door to it at jack-in points.
When you befriend a Mr. Prog, get a token. Can spend a token to reroll a Navi roll.
On NetOp critical success, the PET autoposts a cool picture of it to social media.
Can roll Info to analyze social media and judge 2 peoples’ romantic compatibility.
On jack-in, you have a cool, small ride (e.g. roller skates, snowboard, pogo stick).
When you agree to a deal, whoever breaks the deal has their face & voice distort.
Must spend 1 Bravery to knowingly subvert the wishes of a Navi with Master installed.
Can spend 1 Sense to briefly hear all conversations taking place in the server.
When you roll, can spend 1 Mind to reroll and use the better result; your body glows.
Once per jack-in, add 1 hit to an opposed roll, even after rolling. Suffer bad luck later.
On enemy deletion, heal = its Max HP. No other healing, even jack-out. Full HP to uninstall.
You can see a colored aura around everyone that indicates their emotional state.
On Jack-In, hex a Chip. Next time you use it, it covers the target in your element.
Non-multihit Dangerous chips deal +1 dmg, but the collateral damage always backfires.
On successful defense with Speed, +2 dice to your next attack roll. Doesn’t stack.
Can spend 2 HP to spawn your element Close, generating it from within your body.
When you break something big/valuable, +2 dice to your next Strength roll. No stacking.
On Cost Power use, turn into a beast for 3 rolls! Beasts ignore stat & skill reductions.
When you win a parry, you can freeze time long enough for one more roll/BattleChip.
On jack-in, pick a Near Navi with Servant installed. You mirror each others’ healing.
Detecting a target with BlindMode reveals them to all allies for 3 rolls.
Can place a remote, livestreaming camera with all senses. One at a time.
Tracker finds vulnerable, hidden, or inconsistent parts of the environment.
Shows the target’s speed, destination, and exact movements and actions so far.
Splash can use AP rounds, downshifting Speed and upshifting Stamina defense.
Choose when shots detonate. 2 primed shots at once. Roll dmg on detonation.
LockOn can be used to make Shot chips Accurate and ignore Guards.
Can instead mark a target. Your ranged attacks can parry their ranged attacks.
Volley can also boost any (non-defense) Strength, Coding, or Speed roll.
Can instead spend 1 Sense to reroll an attack you just made.
Can spend hits to learn their: NetOp, Bonds, Zenny, and emotional state.
Add +2 dice to the first 2 allied rolls vs. the target. Once per target.
Foresight also lets you parry, not just dodge.
If you successfully defend with Foresight, you can move a range band away.
You can find distant memories if you give a specific date/time.
MemoryScan can also scan Navis. [Often illegal.]
You can spend an unused chip in your Folder to activate Reconfig.
On hit, your next melee attack takes a chip (GM’s pick) from the target’s Folder.
Can instead reduce Max HP by 2 to use Refresh. Resets on jack-out.
If a target completely resists a chip, it is not exhausted. Once per BattleChip.
On blocking a default Navi Power/ NCP, you can use it once until next Disruption.
If used Close, can also deal damage. On hit, reduce damage by 1.
If the door is destroyed, it turns into a Normal hazard and you’re alerted.
After a couple minutes, doors allow travel directly between each other.
You can apply NoClip to a Close target.
You can use NoClip to dodge attacks that would pass through you.
You can reduce your Max HP for +EB, 1 HP for 1EB. Can be undone.
If you spend a minute of uninterrupted concentration, HotSwap has no cost.
Structures can move independently; Easy Coding roll to change the speed.
Structures can be bouncy, sticky, floating, slippery, magnetic, or gelatinous.
When a Gutsy’d ally rolls to melee attack midair, they add your Body.
You can roll 1 fewer die on any melee attack to give it Gutsy’s effect.
Before rolling, can choose for the target object to become a Normal hazard.
Shatter can be silent if you have a few moments of uninterrupted preparation.
Deal one less damage to knock the target over on hit.
Spend 1 Wave chip to give Shockwave its properties for X+1 rolls. X=chip dmg.
Can use BreakCharge with melee chips. They also become Piercing.
Can upshift one of the target’s skills instead of Body rolls. (Does not stack.)
One target can be Near range if you pick a Close target to launch at them.
Followthrough is free if it deletes a target. Reset Strength penalties on multi-delete.
FlowState lets you constrict a Close target. Upshift resisting with Stamina.
You can hide in a Close abundance of your element indefinitely.
JumpJets covers all enemies Close to your launch point with your element.
On success, you can downshift your next attack and upshift your next defense.
When you spend a Speed point or roll a crit with Speed, you can briefly go invisible.
SneakRun can affect others too as long as they stay Close to you.
Can spend a reroll to downshift a Charm or Bravery roll.
Spend a reroll to give a transient, incorporeal hologram of you 1 order.
Within 10 seconds of warping, you can warp back to your starting point for free.
You can use Warp on a Close ally or object instead.
Can instead choose these effects: loud; decorated; buoyant; flammable; or ugly.
When you have a Guard chip active, downshift ArmorChange rolls.
GravArmor can drag a Near object or airborne target into Close range.
When you stick to a surface, any Close allies can gravity-latch onto your body.
You can Reflect projectiles with a melee attack instead, BattleChips included.
If you win, you can instead convert your hits to bonus dice on your next roll.
When you slot in a Guard chip, activate Clear’s effect on yourself for free.
Can instead modify your next attack to remove temporary buffs on hit.
Each time Regenerate heals 1 HP, a small amount of your element appears Close.
All healing can exceed Max HP. While over Max and not healing, take -1 HP each roll.
On a success, targets will not remember your identity if you choose.
You can also avert hostile attention from X Close allies. X=hits-1.
Hypnotize works on humans if you are on a large screen. [Often illegal.]
On success, you can describe the target’s dream as detailed as you like.
Playback can generate any noise you’ve heard before or can find online.
Your voice can come from any real-world speaker Near your physical jack-in point.
You can apply ModelEdit to a Close target.
ModelEdit can be used as a Roll Power. Major changes require a minute of focus.
Overwrite also works on generic/unnamed digital NPCs. [Often illegal.]
If a Virus is near deletion, you can permanently tame them (1 Virus at a time).
Glare works on fleeing Near targets. They turn to face you.
Briefly stun a target the first time you successfully Glare them.
On success, an elemental ring shuts others out and you and the targets in.
When parrying a SystemCall target, you can turn one failure into an escalation.
Roll 1 fewer die to rush from Near to Close range as part of the attack.
When an enemy damages an ally, add dice to your roll = HP lost.
If you defend by parrying, the cost is refunded.
You can defend all Close allies at once from a multitarget attack.
Rally can instead let an ally reroll two dice on a Soul roll.
On jack-in, pick any skill. Rally can add 3 dice to an ally roll with that skill instead.
You can make any roll via your minion instead, including Navi Powers.
Whenever something destroys your minion, it explodes into your element.
Detonate all abundances of your element in Near range, damaging all Close to one.
Control is now a melee attack. You gain the element of the last enemy you deleted.
When appearing at your destination, cover everything Close in your element.
You can Shift with a known Near abundance of your element not in sight.
If your next attack deletes, cover all Close to the target with your element.
Non-attack rolls can use CodeInjection as long as they have a target.
Save also gives the target an elemental barrier (Guard) that negates 1 attack.
Save also gives the target control over your element for one roll.
Can attack up to 3 targets in one roll.
Become immune to mobility impairment.
When you miss an attack, a structure nearby the target is destroyed.
Every time you miss an attack, downshift your next attack roll.
Whenever you take damage, instantly teleport up to one range band.
Disappear into a Close surface and reappear seconds later somewhere Near with your element.
Set your element to Ice, Lava, Smoke, or Tar.
Downshift defense rolls until your next attack.
Ranged attacks cover things in your element.
Roll once to attack a Near target. Also damages everything Close to the target.
Throw a Close target into a different, Near target; both take damage.
Attacks are delayed, but spread your element.
Attacks that hit can deal -1 damage to briefly drop the target’s Sense by 1.
Attacks paralyze for a moment on hit.
Your element falls from above, damaging the next Near target that rolls & all Close.
Able to run up walls and ceilings without complication.
Ranged attacks are silent.
When on your element, double your dice for defense rolls.
Attacks swerve over and around obstacles to home in on opponents.
For each point of damage you take, add a point to Speed.
Seal a Close target in a bouncy, floating bubble.
Swap the value of two of the target’s skills. Lasts for 3 rolls.
Cannot attack directly; attacks by launching objects at targets.
Downshift Charm rolls for Close allies.
Suck up Near lights, plunging the area into darkness.
Flash bright lights, briefly blinding anyone Near.
Attacks blind, upshifting target’s next Sense roll.
When attacks hit, target upshifts next Mind roll; next 3 Mind rolls if they are on grass.
Plays a riff that turns Near enemy summoned elements into musical instruments.
Plays a tune that freezes Near Navis in place for X rolls. X = hits rolled.
Plays a melody that blinds Near Navis for 2 rolls.
Pick a Near target. If they win their next opposed roll, hit the loser with a 3-damage bolt.
Repeatedly message a Near Navi’s PET, briefly blocking NetOp/Navi interaction.
Copy a skill & Navi Power from the target. Expires when you get hit.
Roll when someone Near spends Zenny. For every hit, you steal 100z from the target.
On Speed rolls with <2 hits, drop some Zenny. Drop all Zenny on deletion.
Your attacks disable passive Virus/NCP abilities for 2 rolls. (Stat/skill/Folder/HP changes unaffected.)
Change any number’s appearance (no actual effect); like Navi HP, dice pool size, etc.
Turn invisible and able to pass through walls for 3 rolls.
Upshift a Close target’s next 3 Mind rolls.
Knocks the alphabetically first BattleChip out of the target’s Folder.
Copy & use a chip of your choice from a Near target’s Folder.
Lasso a Near target into Close range and hop on their back.
Make a Close target move a range band.
When riding a target, you can make them help you, rolling their skill dice instead of yours.
Move Close to a Near grounded target and attack.
When you roll while Close to your element, heal 1 HP.
You can spend 1 HP to reroll one of your attacks.
Attack everything Close with your element.
Make a hole leading anywhere in Near range.
Upshift enemy rolls to defend with Stamina.
Can spend 1 HP to move a range band after any roll.
Can move a range band and attack simultaneously with no penalty.
Become a huge statue for 2 rolls. Double your Body, but become Immobile.
Roll Speed to attack someone Near; downshift if you just hit someone else with LeapFrog.
Copy the last Navi Power you saw. Hits rolled = number of times usable.
Pick a Near ally; give them up to 4 of your HP and downshift their next roll.
Heal HP equal to each point of damage you deal.
Briefly stun anyone you land Close to.
Turn all your Near element into armor for +1 HP per hit. Can go over Max HP. Doesn’t stack.
When you damage a target, steal their element for 3 rolls. Only you can use it.
Downshifts all of your attacks when parrying.
Give a Near ally a huge weapon. Next time they attack, they roll at least 5 dice.
Can use a Cost Power right after being deleted.
You are invisible until your next roll.
When you are attacked, move Close to the attacker.
Upshifts frontal attacks.
Link to a Near ally with string. Until it breaks or you link to another, you & ally mirror healing, stat/skill increases, and positive effects (e.g. invisibility).
Loudly tell a Near ally where a Near target is. Downshifts their next roll vs. the target.
You can roll Speed on behalf of a Close ally. One ally at a time.
When you move a range band, you can bring one Close target with you.
Add +1 to an ally’s Stamina per hit. One ally at a time; expires on your deletion.
Consume somebody else’s Near element to produce your element.
Consume your element to heal a Close ally 2 HP.
Pose, downshifting all Near allies’ next Soul roll.
You are immobilized when Near Navis look at you.
When you attack with an ally, add your dice to an ally’s attack.
Downshift a Near ally’s next roll to attack and infuse it with your element.
On deletion, burst into a cloud of your element.
Ignore damage from the last attack received.
Can be paid 500z to be made intangible for several seconds.
Swap the value of two skills on yourself or any allied Near Virus.
Make an illusory twin of an ally. When the twin acts in sync with the ally, they roll twice and take the better result. Expires when the ally takes damage.
A tune makes Near allies invincible for their next roll.
A melody heals all Near allies 1 HP per hit.
A flourish for an ally. On their next roll, they reroll all failed dice once.
Disguises Viruses as similarly-proportioned mundane objects.
Distract a group of enemies with quick movement.
When you succeed a Speed roll, all Near allies get +2 dice to their next Speed roll.
You can affect as many Near targets or objects as you like when you roll Affinity.
Change a Near target’s element to yours for X rolls. X = hits rolled.
Your element grows behind or inside a Near object.
When your element is exposed to heat, it explodes for 3 damage to all Close.
Make a dangerous hazard beneath yourself.
Draw a sigil. Any touching it take half damage. Round up.
Set your element to Rain, Snow, Hail, or Tornadoes.
If you get hit with electricity, change your element to Thunder and get +3 Sense.
Create a hidden tripwire. Whoever trips it is covered in your element. Deals damage = to hits rolled.
Attack all grounded Near targets with your element.
Can change your element to any Close liquid.
Enemies within your element upshift their next defense roll.
Enemies can’t see you or allies in your element unless they are Close.
Break a Close object, stealing data held within.
Attacks and parries shatter nearby surfaces.
Change your element to a Near target’s.
Creates a Close mine that explodes for 4 damage when something touches it.
Don your element! Next time you’re hit, ignore damage and spread your element everywhere Near.
When your element touches someone else’s, they can’t manipulate it.
Attack by flinging a Close object at someone Near.
Tunnel through an object to somewhere Near.
Dig a hidden pitfall trap. Depth: 1 range band.
Every time you roll, all of your Near element spreads a little bit more.
Downshift rolls to prevent being moved.
Always leave a trail of your element behind you.
EggMecha deactivates if the Mr. Prog inside is removed.
Add +1 to a stat when you absorb a piece of Mystery Data. Drop the data on deletion.
When you hit a target, they drop 100z per point of damage.
On hit, your next attack makes the target (pick 1): very sleepy; see illusions; upshift next Mind roll.
Summons mist. If you roll 3 times while in the mist, you can warp two range bands away.
When you cover something with your element, gain +1 Sense.
On hit, targets are unable to lie unless they make a Hard Bravery roll or jack out.
Message a Near Navi’s PET with a link. If they open it, it makes a secret backdoor.
Curse Near writing, changing the text and installing a secret PET backdoor on touch.
Send a forged message from any backdoored PET to the NetOp or their contacts.
Secretly send a strong sensation to a Near target. (If to player, GM passes a note explaining.)
Sends (possibly false) info to a Near target in the form of a (possibly fabricated) memory.
Bewitch a Near NPC’s mind, rewriting their sense of morality until they take damage.
Mark a Near target. Hard Coding roll to remove - only one try. Remains after jack-out.
After your deletion, at some point, consume the Mark with a temporary curse (pick 1): make their highest stat 1; they make a loud, embarrassing noise; change their element to Bad Jokes.
Creates a big, hefty textbox with scandalous info you’ve gained. Can absorb 1 attack.
When you hit a Navi, gain +1 Info and an embarrassing/damaging fact from their social media.
Mark a Near target. Removing a Mark requires a Hard Coding roll or jacking out.
Once per minute, you can teleport directly behind any Marked target.
You can move up to a range band immediately after being hit.
When you damage a target or object for the first time, they’re covered with your element.
Everyone other than you sets their Stamina to 0 while touching your element.
Amplify and replay a Near sound, making it clearly audible up to Far range.
Mute a Close sound, making it completely inaudible.
Upshift or downshift the next Speed roll of all Near. Also affects the speed of moving objects.
When a Near ally is about to be deleted, they survive at 1 HP.
Whip a Close target for 1 dmg. Covers them in your element. They get +3 dice to their next roll.
Whip a Close target for 1 dmg. Covers them in your element. They restore all spent skill points.
Rush into Close range of a Near target, flipping over any object in your path.
Invert the temporary stat/skill changes of a Near target. Expires on your death.
Pick an ally in your element. Heal them 3 HP and change their element to yours.
When enemies in your element fail a social Charm/Bravery roll, dictate what they say.
When enemies in your element fail an Info/Sense roll, say what they recall/perceive.
Curse your Close element. Any who touch it (pick 1): hallucinate; go blind; fall asleep.
Temporarily change an object/ally’s appearance to a perfect rhyme of the target’s name.
Secretly pick a word. You can warp directly behind any Far enemy that says that word.
Declare a letter and a Near target. If they say the letter and you are alive, your element covers them.
Move Close to a Near target and steal (pick 1:) Zenny; a Folder chip; a held item.
Pick an ally. Next time they’re damaged, downshift your next attack on the attacker.
Fire a missile that destroys a Near object, leaving a Normal hazard in its wake.
Pick a Close target; all of their present summoned element is scrubbed out of existence.
Rewind a Near object’s damage, movement, and modifications from the past minute.
Fling all Close allies at a Near target, sending them arcing through the air to Close range.
Call a spotlight down on a Near target, briefly deactivating invisibility and Guards.
Mind-control a Near NPC, forcing them to aggressively assist you for one action.
Create your element inside of you. It gradually pulls all Near targets into Close range.
You cannot die from HP loss; dmg pushes you away. Upshift rolls to move range bands.
Move up to a range band silently and almost instantly, as if moving in fast-motion.
Near lights and cameras fade, then go dark for a few seconds. Usable while immobile.
Near lights and cameras fade, then go dark for a few seconds. Usable while immobile. Disconnects PETs.
If anyone sees you, you are immobilized. While immobilized, you are invincible.
When someone looks at a picture of you, learn exactly where they are.
Enter a Close recently-deleted Navi/Virus, fully reviving them. You can’t be hurt while inside.
Add 1 to one of your parasitized host’s skills. Their body distorts to accomodate the change.
You control parasitized targets. Replace their element with yours. They upshift Speed rolls.
Must be within an Infested target. They lose 2 HP. Spawn another WhiteMist Close.
Suck in up to 3 Near objects. Every object inside you adds 1 Stamina; max 9.
Suck in up to 3 Near objects or Viruses. Every object/Virus inside you adds 1 Stamina; max 9. Viruses are unharmed.
Your next Sense attack launches an object from inside you for +1 dmg. Stacks to +3.
Eject an object to Near and change your element to something related to it. Lasts 3 rolls.
When attacked at range, you can spend Stamina to negate incoming damage, 1-to-1.
Your next attack is (pick 1): Accurate; Piercing; electrified; environment-shattering.
Can spend 1 HP and a few seconds to make your next attack hit again. This stacks.
Fire a Near Piercing laser that breaks Guards and pierces unreinforced objects.
Get a Guard that negates all attacks under 3 dmg. Lasts 4 rolls or until you take dmg.
Move your Guard off your body, turning it into a Near wall with the same properties.
When your Guard negates a ranged attack, redirect it to a Near target of your choice.
Make a Near black hole. Spend 1 hit to draw something Near the void Close to it.
Detonate your element! Removes temp. positive effects (e.g. Guards) from any Close.
Pick 2 targets and a Near enemy who picks which target you stun. Failure to pick stuns both.
Attack a Near target with cursed petals. They can divert this attack to all their Near allies.
Attack a Near target with cursed petals. They can divert this attack to all their Near allies. Stuns targets.
Ask every Near stunned enemy a question. If they lie (even by omission), they light on fire.
Warp a range band, then copy a Far target’s appearance and voice. Ends on taking dmg.
Make a ranged attack on a Near target, covering them with all elements you control.
Gain the use of a Near ally’s element in addition to your own.
Create a token of affection for the target. Functionally useless, but thoughtful & caring.
Everyone you meet instantly learns your unique name, favorite color, and favorite treat.
When you roll, Far Viruses learn your location. Starts undetectable, gradually gets obvious.
When you roll, Far Viruses learn your location and gain +1 die to their next roll, stacking. Starts undetectable, gradually gets obvious.
On deletion, you only drop an apology letter. Other drops only come from signal nodes.
Engulf a Close target, binding them and jamming their Folder until they break free.
Infest a Close object, taking control of it. You also heal 2 HP and grow in size.
Infest a Close object or Virus, taking control of it. You also heal 2 HP and grow in size.
Your Strength always equals half your HP, rounded up. Changing one changes the other.
Launch latching worms at a Near target. The worms disable powers/NCPs until removed.
Trap a Close target inside you, blocking PET interaction. One at a time; escape is Hard.
Trap a Near target inside you, blocking PET interaction. One at a time; escape is Hard.
When rolling with someone inside, drain 1 HP. (No defense.) Eject anyone at 1 HP.
Add the stats, skills, and powers of trapped targets to your own.
Turn all Near summoned element into your element.
Disguise yourself by copying a Near object’s form. You must undisguise to act.
After taking damage, halve your HP (round up) and spawn a copy of yourself Near.
When anyone Near is deleted, add their stats to yours.
When anyone Near is deleted, add their stats and skills to yours.
When you are targeted with a power or chip, you can use it three times.
Next time you’re attacked, your element covers everything Close in a Normal hazard.
When you’re attacked, your element covers everything Close in a Normal hazard.
Your vision is foggy. Enemies beyond Close are only visible if they are moving.
Loose a deafening, horrifying roar. It jams all Near PET connections for 3 rolls.
Load a Close ally/object into a carriage (max 3). Loaded things move with you.
Load a Close ally/object into a carriage (max 5). Loaded things move with you.
Launch up to 2 carriages’ contents a range band in any direction.
Allies in carriages heal 1 HP when they roll, and you roll to defend them from all attacks.
Ram a Near target, damaging and moving Close. You can unload any carriage(s) on them.
Slide a range band, returning any broken/removed hazards or summons in your path.
Dance to resurrect a deleted Near Virus ally. HP = hits. Replace their element with yours.
Dance to resurrect a deleted Near ally. HP = hits. Replace their element with yours.
Dance with any Close targets. They will explode on deletion, spreading their element.
Near allies can roll using your Soul instead of theirs.
Pick a Near ally — they use Strength or Coding to manipulate their element for 3 rolls.
Pick a Near ally — their next 3 rolls spawn their element Close to them.
Allies you use powers on will blast into their element on deletion, dealing 3 dmg to all Close.
Pick a Near Virus ally — they get +3 dice to all rolls, but lose 2 HP per roll until deletion.
Parry any attack. Loser takes dmg = the total of the winner’s parry attacks. You can’t back out.
Vaporize a Near object and get a Death token. Spend a token to live while 0 HP for 1 roll.
Vaporize a Near object or a real life object Near the server and get a Death token. Spend a token to live while 0 HP for 1 roll.
Close allies can equip you, adding your skills, element, and other powers to theirs.
Add +1 die per missing point of HP to every roll except for defense rolls.
Turn invisible and teleport up to a range band. Invisibility expires when you are hurt.
Manipulate any number of Near objects (e.g. slam doors, press buttons, toss items, etc).
You can make each viewer perceive your element differently.
Mark a Close target. Remains on jack-out. Consume the mark to warp Near the target.
Change your element to anything you want.
Swap 2+ Near targets’ elements. Lasts 3 rolls.
When you’re hurt, spawn your element Close.
You can control up to 3 elements at once.
Your element briefly (pick 1): reveals invisibility; blinds Close to it; starts growing in size.
(Requires 8+ Affinity.) Overheat a Near target’s PET. Interrupts the connection.
After rolling Affinity, gain 1 Affinity, lose 1 HP, and increase the server’s temperature.
After rolling Affinity, gain 2 Affinity, lose 2 HP, and greatly increase the server’s temperature.
(Requires 20+ Affinity.) Pick an object Near the real-world server; it catches on fire.
Create a Near door that leads to a fake room. The room’s walls count as your body.
Modify your room’s contents. Complex objects have tells to hint at the room’s nature.
Within your room, you can roll Affinity to manipulate anyone’s summoned element.
Add a fake creature to the room. It rolls with your stats and skills. It cannot speak.
Once per jack-in, can send an SOS w/ your location to all chat rooms on the server.
Your body beeps loudly to censor any Near audible insults or rude language.
A heads-up display shows the status of your bonded allies in very limited detail.
You can roll Charm instead of Coding to hack into Close inanimate Viruses.
Shortly after targets are deleted, you can speak with them. Viruses will be friendly.
Secret comms channel! Contains strange signals, odd secrets, and... Virus chatter?
